io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.user

Class DLUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.user.User
      • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.user.DLUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMentionable, IUser, ICreationTime, ISnowflake

    public class DLUser
extends User
    Represents the user that you are currently logged in as.
    Author:
    Perry Berman

        public CompletableFuture<DLUser> setAvatar(String avatarLocation)
                                    throws IOException
        Sets the currently logged in user's avatar
        Parameters:
        avatarLocation - The location on disk of the new avatar image
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that completes with this if successfull, or the error response if failed. Returns null if this.id != this.loader.user.id
        Throws:
        IOException
